page.title: 14Santa Pod
page.content: About forty-five years ago there was a war on and Santa Pod was an airfield. Now the airfield is used as a drag racing strip. The strip is a quarter of a mile long. When it is hot they need to put water on the track so that the rubber does not burn. My Grandad owns the airfield. He lives in a bungalow. Some of the things from the war you can still see. You can see some old air-raid shelters and huts. My Dad rents some of the buildings. You can see a painting of a bomber in one of the buildings.
